actionCalls.description: Parse the JSON string for the Asset (N4L Equipment Register)
actionCalls.name: Parse_Asset_JSON
actionCalls.label: Parse Asset JSON

actionCalls.description: Parse the JSON string for the Element
actionCalls.name: Parse_Element_JSON
actionCalls.label: Parse Element JSON

actionCalls.description: Parse the JSON string for the Asset (N4L Equipment Register)
actionCalls.name: Parse_Link_JSON
actionCalls.label: Parse Link JSON

actionCalls.description: Post an Error Message to Platform Services with Flow fault message
actionCalls.name: Post_Asset_Error_Message1_to_PS
actionCalls.label: Post Asset Error Message1 to PS

actionCalls.description: Post an Error Message to Platform Services with Flow fault message
actionCalls.name: Post_Asset_Error_Message_to_PS
actionCalls.label: Post Asset Error Message to PS

actionCalls.description: Post success message to Platform Services with new record ID of Asset
actionCalls.name: Post_Asset_Success_Message
actionCalls.label: Post Asset Success Message

actionCalls.description: Post an Error Message to Platform Services with Flow fault message
actionCalls.name: Post_Element_Error_Message_to_PS
actionCalls.label: Post Element Error Message to PS

actionCalls.description: Post an Error Message to Platform Services with Flow fault message for link
actionCalls.name: Post_Link_Error_Message_to_PS
actionCalls.label: Post Link Error Message to PS

actionCalls.description: Post success message to Platform Services for link
actionCalls.name: Post_Link_Success_Message
actionCalls.label: Post Link Success Message

actionCalls.description: Post success message to Platform Services with new record ID
actionCalls.name: Post_Success_Message_Element
actionCalls.label: Post Success Message - Element

assignments.description: Set the assetID variable to send back to Asset Reconiliation service
assignments.name: Assign_updated_Asset_ID
assignments.label: Assign updated Asset ID

assignments.description: Assign the updated Network Element salesforce record ID to a variable to send with Success Message
assignments.name: Assign_updated_Element_ID
assignments.label: Assign updated Element ID

constants.description: The developer name of the Record Type for the asset (N4L Equipment Register) record created
constants.name: assetRecordTypeName

constants.description: The developer name of the record type used to create the Network Element (Device__c) record
constants.name: elementRecordTypeName

decisions.description: Is there an asset included in the JSON message?
decisions.name: Asset
decisions.label: Asset

decisions.description: Is there an existing element to update (based on UUID)?
decisions.name: Create_or_Update
decisions.label: Create or Update?

decisions.description: Is there an existing asset (N4L Equipment Register) record with the UUID send in the JSON? If yes, update the existing one, if not, create a new one.
decisions.name: Create_or_Update_asset
decisions.label: Create or Update asset

decisions.description: Check flow method to see if Asset should be deleted
decisions.name: Delete_Asset
decisions.label: Delete Asset?

decisions.description: Is there a link included in the JSON message
decisions.name: Link
decisions.label: Link?

decisions.description: Is there a Network Element in the JSON message? Check for _id field, if blank, move to next object (asset). If _id exists, create or update the record.
decisions.name: Network_Element
decisions.label: Network Element

Flow.description: Manage create, update and delete of Network Elements and Equipment Register records from Asset Reconciliation service

formulas.description: The asset ID with 'asset-' prepended. To identify the object type for reply to asset-reconciliation service
formulas.name: assetReplyID

formulas.description: Converts text of asset shipment date to date field. Used to populate the Warranty start date on Asset record.
formulas.name: assetShipmentDate

formulas.description: A formula that gets the integer value of the text parsed from JSON for moeFunded field
formulas.name: elementMoeFundedNumber

formulas.description: The element ID with 'element-' prepended, to identify ID type when sending response for asset reconciliation service.
formulas.name: elementReplyID

formulas.description: Input the link id into the ids property in the success or error message sent to asset reconciliation service
formulas.name: linkReplyID

formulas.description: The lower case of the Flow Service field on PSI record. Sent as event action in succuss or error reply
formulas.name: responseAction

Flow.label: N4L PSI Asset Reconciliation subflow

recordCreates.description: Create the asset (N4L Equipment Register) record based on values in JSON
recordCreates.name: Create_Asset
recordCreates.label: Create Asset

recordDeletes.description: Delete the Asset (N4L Equipment Register) record
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Asset_Record
recordDeletes.label: Delete Asset Record

recordDeletes.description: Delete the Network Element using UUID provided
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Network_Element
recordDeletes.label: Delete Network Element

recordLookups.description: Query to check if there is an element record existing in Salesforce based on UUID provided
recordLookups.name: Check_for_Existing_Element
recordLookups.label: Check for Existing Element

recordLookups.description: Check to see if there is an existing asset (N4L Equipment Register) record with the _id (SourceUUID) sent in the JSON
recordLookups.name: Check_if_Asset_exists
recordLookups.label: Check if Asset exists

recordLookups.description: Get Record Type based on Developer Name input in assetRecordTypeName variable
recordLookups.name: Get_Asset_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Asset Record Type

recordLookups.description: Get the Element record from the UUID to be linked to the Asset
recordLookups.name: Get_Element_to_Link_to_Asset
recordLookups.label: Get Element to Link to Asset

recordLookups.description: Get the Order based on the PO Number sent through
recordLookups.name: Get_Order
recordLookups.label: Get Order

recordLookups.description: Get the product record for the asset based on the productNo sent in JSON, store the device make and model ID and product ID for asset create/update. Shipment report may contain SKU or Product Code, so the record filter will check both fields
recordLookups.name: Get_Product
recordLookups.label: Get Product

recordLookups.description: Get the product record for the element based on the productCode or productId sent in JSON, store the device make and model ID and product ID for asset create/update.
recordLookups.name: Get_Product_for_Element
recordLookups.label: Get Product for Element

recordLookups.description: Get Record Type based on Developer Name input in recordTypeName variable
recordLookups.name: Get_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type

recordUpdates.description: Based on the JSON, link the Asset and the Element together
recordUpdates.name: Update_Asset_with_Link_to_Element
recordUpdates.label: Update Asset with Link to Element

recordUpdates.description: When the Asset and Element are linked, update the status of the Element to 'Active'
recordUpdates.name: Update_Element_to_Active
recordUpdates.label: Update Element to Active

recordUpdates.description: Update record based on new values
recordUpdates.name: Update_Network_Element
recordUpdates.label: Update Network Element

recordUpdates.description: Update the existing Asset record (N4L Equipment Register) based on UUID.
recordUpdates.name: Update_the_existing_asset
recordUpdates.label: Update the existing asset

recordUpdates.description: Update the existing Asset record (N4L Equipment Register) based on UUID.
recordUpdates.name: Update_the_existing_asset_with_comment
recordUpdates.label: Update the existing asset with comment

variables.description: Asset ID of the created or updated asset. Used in success message
variables.name: assetID

variables.description: The JSON for the asset sent from asset reconciliation service
variables.name: assetJSON

variables.description: The MAC Address of the Asset sent in JSON
variables.name: assetMacAddress

variables.description: The make and model record ID of the asset based on the product sent in JSON
variables.name: assetMakeModelId

variables.description: The PO Number sent in the Asset JSON. NOTE - this field is called orderId in JSON
variables.name: assetPONumber

variables.description: The Product2 record ID of the Asset based on the Product Number sent in the JSON
variables.name: assetProductId

variables.description: Product SKU of Asset sent in JSON string (property name = productNo in JSON) Shipment report may contain SKU or Product Code, so this variable will reflect what was sent in the shipment report.
variables.name: assetProductSKU

variables.description: The serial number of the asset sent in the JSON
variables.name: assetSerialNumber

variables.description: The shipment date parsed from JSON stored as text. Used in formula assetShipmentDate to convert to Date field
variables.name: assetShipmentDateText

variables.description: The UUID sent in the JSON for the asset (property name _id)
variables.name: assetSourceUUID

variables.description: Courier tracking link from JSON
variables.name: assetTrackLink

variables.description: School Account ID
variables.name: elementAccountID

variables.description: Salesforce ID for Device Make and Model record provided in Element JSON
variables.name: elementDeviceMakeId

variables.description: The Host Name of the Device
variables.name: elementHostName

variables.description: The salesforce ID of the Network Element created / update
variables.name: elementID

variables.description: Where is the device installed (Building, Floor, Room, Rack name, and U Position). Parsed from JSON element object
variables.name: elementInstallationLocation

variables.description: The JSON from the element sent from Asset Reconciliation service
variables.name: elementJSON

variables.description: Text output of MoeFunded field in JSON
variables.name: elementMoeFundedText

variables.description: Product Code parsed from JSON element object
variables.name: elementProductCode

variables.description: The ID of the Product record in salesforce. This is 'salesforceId' in the JSON. For the Element
variables.name: elementProductId

variables.description: UUID of the source record in N4L Platform Services environment.
variables.name: elementSourceDataUUID

variables.description: UUID of Asset (N4L Equipment Register) to link
variables.name: linkAssetUUID

variables.description: The Salesforce Id of the Element to be linked.
variables.name: linkElementId

variables.description: UUID of Network Element (Device) to link
variables.name: linkElementUUID

variables.description: The UUID of the link (in PS link is a separate table)
variables.name: linkUUID

variables.description: The PSI record passed to subflow from record-triggered flow.
variables.name: PlatformServicesIntegrationRecord
